dcterms:creator: Mahshid Noorani
Spiros Mancoridis
Steven Weber
dcterms:description: A dataset containing sequences of system calls used to detect malware behavior on IoT devices, specifically focusing on the activities of processes running on a Linux router.
dcterms:title: System Call Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mahshid Noorani
Spiros Mancoridis
Steven Weber
dcterms:description: A dataset containing network traffic data used to analyze and detect anomalies related to malware behavior on IoT devices.
dcterms:title: Network Traffic Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mahshid Noorani
Spiros Mancoridis
Steven Weber
dcterms:description: A combined dataset that integrates both system call and network traffic data to enhance the detection of malware behavior on IoT devices.
dcterms:title: Combined Dataset (System Calls and Network Traffic)

dcterms:creator: Mahshid Noorani
Spiros Mancoridis
Steven Weber
dcterms:description: A dataset generated by the CICFlowMeter tool that captures network traffic flows for analysis and anomaly detection in IoT environments.
dcterms:title: CICFlowMeter Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mahshid Noorani
Spiros Mancoridis
Steven Weber
dcterms:description: A collection of malware samples including keylogger, ransomware, and cryptominer, designed to evaluate the effectiveness of anomaly detection systems.
dcterms:title: Malware Samples (Keylogger, Ransomware, Cryptominer)
